alert.note: Alert for Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN MARINETTE AND CENTRAL OCONTO COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM CDT... At 612 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Bear Paw Scout Camp, or 23 miles northeast of Shawano, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oconto around 650 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Spruce, Cullen, Stiles, Oconto Falls, County Line, Harmony, Peshtigo, Lena, Hayes, and Pensaukee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County
